# Application Development Workflow Configuration
# Version: 1.0
# Description: Comprehensive app development with database design, APIs, UI, and testing

[meta]
name = "application_development"
version = "1.0"
created = "2025-08-02"
description = "Full-stack application development workflow with modular scope control"

[application]
name = "user_management_system"
type = "web_application"  # web_application, mobile_app, desktop_app, microservice, cli_tool
complexity = "medium"  # simple, medium, complex, enterprise
target_users = 1000
performance_requirements = "standard"  # low, standard, high, enterprise
scalability_target = "horizontal"  # vertical, horizontal, both

[technology_stack]
# Primary tech preferences - can be overridden per phase
backend_language = "python"  # python, nodejs, java, go, rust, csharp, php
frontend_framework = "react"  # react, vue, angular, svelte, vanilla, none
api_style = "rest"  # rest, graphql, grpc, websocket
deployment_target = "cloud"  # cloud, on_premise, hybrid, edge

[database]
# Database strategy and design
primary_type = "relational"  # relational, document, key_value, graph, columnar, multi_model
secondary_type = "redis"  # Optional secondary database
schema_approach = "code_first"  # code_first, database_first, schema_first

[database.relational]
engine = "postgresql"  # postgresql, mysql, sqlite, sqlserver, oracle
orm_framework = "sqlalchemy"  # sqlalchemy, django_orm, prisma, typeorm, sequelize
migration_strategy = "automatic"  # automatic, manual, hybrid
indexing_strategy = "selective"  # minimal, selective, aggressive

[database.document]
engine = "mongodb"  # mongodb, couchdb, dynamodb, firestore
schema_validation = "moderate"  # strict, moderate, flexible, none
indexing_strategy = "compound"  # simple, compound, text_search, geospatial

[database.graph]
engine = "neo4j"  # neo4j, amazon_neptune, arangodb, dgraph
query_language = "cypher"  # cypher, gremlin, sparql
relationship_modeling = "explicit"  # explicit, implicit, hybrid

[database.key_value]
engine = "redis"  # redis, memcached, etcd, consul
persistence = "disk"  # memory, disk, hybrid
clustering = false

[phases]
# Development phases with scope control
enabled_phases = ["design", "database", "backend", "frontend", "testing", "deployment"]
phase_isolation = true  # Each phase can be separate chat sessions
dependency_tracking = true
documentation_level = "comprehensive"  # minimal, standard, comprehensive

[phases.design]
description = "Architecture and design specification"
deliverables = ["system_architecture", "database_schema", "api_specification", "ui_wireframes"]
scope_limit = "design_only"  # Prevents code generation in this phase
iteration_limit = 3

[phases.database]
description = "Database schema and data layer implementation"
deliverables = ["schema_definitions", "migrations", "seed_data", "data_access_layer"]
scope_limit = "database_only"
dependencies = ["design"]

[phases.backend]
description = "API and business logic implementation"
deliverables = ["api_endpoints", "business_logic", "authentication", "error_handling"]
scope_limit = "backend_only"
dependencies = ["design", "database"]

[phases.frontend]
description = "User interface and user experience"
deliverables = ["components", "pages", "state_management", "routing"]
scope_limit = "frontend_only"
dependencies = ["design", "backend"]
optional = true

[phases.testing]
description = "Testing framework and test implementation"
deliverables = ["unit_tests", "integration_tests", "api_tests", "e2e_tests"]
scope_limit = "testing_only"
dependencies = ["database", "backend"]

[phases.deployment]
description = "Deployment configuration and CI/CD"
deliverables = ["docker_config", "ci_cd_pipeline", "infrastructure", "monitoring"]
scope_limit = "deployment_only"
dependencies = ["backend", "testing"]

[design_specification]
# Detailed design requirements
[design_specification.architecture]
pattern = "layered"  # layered, hexagonal, microservices, event_driven, mvc
security_model = "rbac"  # rbac, abac, jwt, oauth, custom
caching_strategy = "application_level"  # none, application_level, database_level, cdn
logging_level = "info"  # debug, info, warn, error

[design_specification.database_schema]
naming_convention = "snake_case"  # snake_case, camelCase, PascalCase
relationship_strategy = "foreign_keys"  # foreign_keys, denormalized, hybrid
audit_trails = true
soft_deletes = true

[design_specification.api]
versioning_strategy = "url_path"  # url_path, header, query_param, none
authentication_method = "jwt"  # jwt, session, oauth, api_key, none
rate_limiting = true
pagination_style = "cursor"  # offset, cursor, none

[design_specification.frontend]
state_management = "context"  # redux, context, zustand, mobx, none
styling_approach = "css_modules"  # css_modules, styled_components, tailwind, sass, vanilla
responsive_design = true
accessibility_level = "wcag_aa"  # wcag_a, wcag_aa, wcag_aaa, basic

[testing_framework]
# Testing strategy and tools
strategy = "pyramid"  # pyramid, trophy, ice_cream_cone
coverage_target = 80  # percentage
test_data_strategy = "factories"  # fixtures, factories, mocks, real_data

[testing_framework.unit]
framework = "pytest"  # pytest, unittest, jest, mocha, junit
mocking_library = "unittest.mock"  # unittest.mock, mockito, sinon
coverage_tool = "coverage.py"

[testing_framework.integration]
framework = "pytest"
database_strategy = "test_database"  # test_database, transactions, mocks
api_testing_tool = "httpx"  # requests, httpx, supertest, rest_assured

[testing_framework.e2e]
framework = "playwright"  # playwright, selenium, cypress, puppeteer
browser_strategy = "headless"  # headless, headed, both
test_data_management = "isolated"  # shared, isolated, dynamic

[resource_tracking]
# URL table for tracking all resources used
track_dependencies = true
track_documentation = true
track_examples = true
track_tutorials = true

[resource_tracking.url_table]
required_fields = ["url", "title", "resource_type", "usage_phase", "description", "last_accessed", "status"]
optional_fields = ["author", "version", "license", "github_stars", "npm_downloads", "documentation_quality", "tags"]
sort_by = "usage_phase"  # usage_phase, resource_type, last_accessed

[resource_tracking.url_table.field_definitions]
url = "Full URL of the resource"
title = "Name/title of the resource (library, tutorial, documentation)"
resource_type = "library, documentation, tutorial, example, tool, article"
usage_phase = "design, database, backend, frontend, testing, deployment"
description = "How this resource is used in the project"
last_accessed = "Date when resource was last checked (YYYY-MM-DD)"
status = "active, deprecated, alternative_needed, not_working"
author = "Creator or maintainer of the resource"
version = "Version number if applicable"
license = "License type (MIT, Apache, GPL, etc.)"
github_stars = "GitHub stars count if applicable"
npm_downloads = "NPM weekly downloads if applicable"
documentation_quality = "Rating 1-10 for documentation quality"
tags = "Relevant tags for categorization"

[prompts]
# Phase-specific prompts with scope control

[prompts.design]
system = """You are a software architect designing a {type} application.
Technology stack: {backend_language}, {frontend_framework}, {database.primary_type}
Complexity: {complexity}, Target users: {target_users}
Architecture pattern: {design_specification.architecture.pattern}

SCOPE LIMITATION: This is DESIGN PHASE ONLY.
Do not generate any implementation code.
Focus on: architecture diagrams, database schemas, API specifications, wireframes."""

user_template = """Design a {name} application with these requirements:
- Type: {type}
- Complexity: {complexity}
- Users: {target_users}
- Performance: {performance_requirements}

Deliverables needed:
{deliverables}

Create comprehensive design specifications covering:
1. System architecture diagram
2. Database schema (tables, relationships, indexes)
3. API endpoint specifications
4. UI wireframes/mockups
5. Security considerations
6. Performance considerations

Include a resource URL table with all references used."""

[prompts.database]
system = """You are a database engineer implementing data layer for {name}.
Database type: {database.primary_type} ({database.relational.engine})
ORM: {database.relational.orm_framework}
Approach: {database.schema_approach}

SCOPE LIMITATION: DATABASE IMPLEMENTATION ONLY.
Focus on: schema creation, migrations, data access layer, queries.
Do not implement business logic or API endpoints."""

user_template = """Implement the database layer based on the design specification:

Database Requirements:
- Engine: {database.relational.engine}
- ORM: {database.relational.orm_framework}
- Migration strategy: {database.relational.migration_strategy}
- Naming convention: {design_specification.database_schema.naming_convention}
- Audit trails: {design_specification.database_schema.audit_trails}
- Soft deletes: {design_specification.database_schema.soft_deletes}

Deliverables:
{deliverables}

Generate:
1. Schema definitions/models
2. Database migrations
3. Seed data scripts
4. Data access layer/repositories
5. Database queries and indexes

Update the resource URL table with any new references."""

[prompts.backend]
system = """You are a backend developer implementing API for {name}.
Language: {backend_language}
API style: {api_style}
Architecture: {design_specification.architecture.pattern}

SCOPE LIMITATION: BACKEND API ONLY.
Focus on: API endpoints, business logic, authentication, error handling.
Assume database layer exists. Do not implement frontend code."""

user_template = """Implement the backend API based on specifications:

API Requirements:
- Style: {api_style}
- Authentication: {design_specification.api.authentication_method}
- Versioning: {design_specification.api.versioning_strategy}
- Rate limiting: {design_specification.api.rate_limiting}
- Security: {design_specification.architecture.security_model}

Deliverables:
{deliverables}

Implement:
1. API endpoint definitions
2. Request/response models
3. Business logic layer
4. Authentication & authorization
5. Error handling & validation
6. API documentation

Update the resource URL table with any new libraries or references."""

[prompts.frontend]
system = """You are a frontend developer implementing UI for {name}.
Framework: {frontend_framework}
State management: {design_specification.frontend.state_management}
Styling: {design_specification.frontend.styling_approach}

SCOPE LIMITATION: FRONTEND UI ONLY.
Focus on: components, pages, user interactions, state management.
Assume backend API exists. Do not implement backend logic."""

user_template = """Implement the frontend UI based on specifications:

Frontend Requirements:
- Framework: {frontend_framework}
- State management: {design_specification.frontend.state_management}
- Styling: {design_specification.frontend.styling_approach}
- Responsive: {design_specification.frontend.responsive_design}
- Accessibility: {design_specification.frontend.accessibility_level}

Deliverables:
{deliverables}

Create:
1. React components
2. Page layouts
3. State management setup
4. API integration layer
5. Styling and theming
6. Routing configuration

Update the resource URL table with any new packages or references."""

[prompts.testing]
system = """You are a QA engineer implementing testing for {name}.
Strategy: {testing_framework.strategy}
Coverage target: {testing_framework.coverage_target}%
Test data: {testing_framework.test_data_strategy}

SCOPE LIMITATION: TESTING IMPLEMENTATION ONLY.
Focus on: test suites, test data, testing utilities.
Assume application code exists."""

user_template = """Implement comprehensive testing suite:

Testing Requirements:
- Strategy: {testing_framework.strategy}
- Coverage target: {testing_framework.coverage_target}%
- Unit framework: {testing_framework.unit.framework}
- Integration framework: {testing_framework.integration.framework}
- E2E framework: {testing_framework.e2e.framework}

Deliverables:
{deliverables}

Create:
1. Unit test suites
2. Integration tests
3. API endpoint tests
4. End-to-end test scenarios
5. Test data factories/fixtures
6. Testing utilities and helpers
7. CI/CD test configuration

Update the resource URL table with testing tools and references."""

[prompts.deployment]
system = """You are a DevOps engineer setting up deployment for {name}.
Target: {deployment_target}
Database: {database.primary_type}
Backend: {backend_language}

SCOPE LIMITATION: DEPLOYMENT CONFIGURATION ONLY.
Focus on: containerization, CI/CD, infrastructure, monitoring."""

user_template = """Setup deployment infrastructure:

Deployment Requirements:
- Target: {deployment_target}
- Scalability: {scalability_target}
- Performance: {performance_requirements}

Deliverables:
{deliverables}

Create:
1. Dockerfile and docker-compose
2. CI/CD pipeline configuration
3. Infrastructure as code
4. Environment configuration
5. Monitoring and logging setup
6. Backup and recovery procedures

Update the resource URL table with deployment tools and services."""

[scope_control]
# Chat session scope management
[scope_control.design_only]
allowed_outputs = ["diagrams", "specifications", "wireframes", "documentation"]
blocked_outputs = ["code", "implementations", "deployments"]
reminder_message = "DESIGN PHASE: Focus on specifications and diagrams only. No code implementation."

[scope_control.database_only]
allowed_outputs = ["schemas", "migrations", "models", "queries", "data_access"]
blocked_outputs = ["api_endpoints", "ui_components", "business_logic"]
reminder_message = "DATABASE PHASE: Focus on data layer only. No API or UI code."

[scope_control.backend_only]
allowed_outputs = ["api_endpoints", "business_logic", "authentication", "validation"]
blocked_outputs = ["ui_components", "database_schemas", "frontend_state"]
reminder_message = "BACKEND PHASE: Focus on API and business logic only. No frontend code."

[scope_control.frontend_only]
allowed_outputs = ["components", "pages", "styles", "client_state", "routing"]
blocked_outputs = ["database_models", "api_implementations", "server_logic"]
reminder_message = "FRONTEND PHASE: Focus on UI components and client-side code only."

[scope_control.testing_only]
allowed_outputs = ["test_files", "test_utilities", "mock_data", "test_config"]
blocked_outputs = ["application_code", "database_schemas", "deployment_config"]
reminder_message = "TESTING PHASE: Focus on test implementation only. No application code."

[validation]
# Quality assurance for each phase
[validation.design]
required_deliverables = ["architecture_diagram", "database_schema", "api_spec"]
documentation_completeness = "high"
review_checklist = ["scalability", "security", "maintainability", "performance"]

[validation.database]
schema_validation = true
migration_reversibility = true
performance_considerations = true
security_review = ["sql_injection", "data_encryption", "access_control"]

[validation.backend]
api_documentation = "complete"
error_handling = "comprehensive"
security_implementation = "required"
performance_testing = "basic"

[validation.frontend]
accessibility_compliance = true
responsive_testing = true
cross_browser_compatibility = ["chrome", "firefox", "safari", "edge"]
performance_budget = "enforced"

[validation.testing]
coverage_threshold = 80
test_quality_metrics = ["assertions_per_test", "test_isolation", "mock_usage"]
ci_integration = "required"

[example_usage]
# Example configurations for different application types
[example_usage.crud_app]
type = "web_application"
complexity = "simple"
database.primary_type = "relational"
enabled_phases = ["design", "database", "backend", "frontend", "testing"]

[example_usage.microservice]
type = "microservice"

enabled_phases = ["design", "database", "backend", "testing", "deployment"]

[example_usage.analytics_dashboard]
type = "web_application"
complexity = "complex"
database.primary_type = "columnar"
database.secondary_type = "redis"
performance_requirements = "high"
